mapper.select: select i.item_name, i.item_code, i.item_type, wd.wh_code, wd.good_quantity, wd.bad_quantity, wd.update_user, i.stock_unit from wh_stock_detail wd, item i where wd.item_code = i.item_code and i.item_name like '%' || upper(#{itemName}) || '%' and i.item_type = #{itemType}
select wh_code, wh_name, use_yn from wh
select count(i.item_code) from item i join wh_stock_detail wd on i.item_code = wd.item_code
select count(i.item_code) from item i join wh_stock_detail wd on i.item_code = wd.item_code where wd.wh_code = #{whCode}

select * from (select rownum rn, n.* from (select i.item_code, i.item_name, wd.wh_code as wdCode, w.wh_name, w.company_code, m.member_name, w.update_date, w.use_yn from item i join wh_stock_detail wd on i.item_code = wd.item_code join wh w on wd.wh_code = w.wh_code join member m on w.update_user = m.member_uid where wd.wh_Code = #{wdCode}) n ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select b.low_item_code, i.item_name, wd.wh_code, w.wh_name, wd.good_quantity, wd.bad_quantity from bom b join item i on b.low_item_code = i.item_code join item io on b.high_item_code = io.item_code join wh_stock_detail wd on b.low_item_code = wd.item_code join wh w on wd.wh_code = w.wh_code where io.item_name like '%' || upper(#{itemName}) || '%' and i.item_type = #{itemType}
